Lincoln Mullen

  • CV
  • Writing
Lincoln Mullen is a graduate student and historian of religion and early America.

I am a PhD student in American history at Brandeis University in Waltham, Massachusetts. I study American religious history, as well as American history in the colonial and antebellum eras.

For academic information, see my curriculum vitae.

Citations and in most cases the full text of my writings are available on this site.
